00069     class Factory
00070     {
00071     public:
00078         typedef Appender *(*AppenderFactoryFunc)();
00079         
00086         typedef Filter *(*FilterFactoryFunc)();
00087

00356     inline Appender *Factory::createAppender(const QString &rAppenderClassName)
00357     {   return instance()->doCreateAppender(rAppenderClassName);    }
00358     
00359     inline Appender *Factory::createAppender(const char *pAppenderClassName)
00360     {   return instance()->doCreateAppender(QLatin1String(pAppenderClassName)); }
00361

00363     {   return instance()->doCreateFilter(rFilterClassName);    }

00398     inline QStringList Factory::registeredAppenders()
00399     {   QMutexLocker locker(&instance()->mObjectGuard);
00400         return instance()->mAppenderRegistry.keys();    }
00401     
00402     inline QStringList Factory::registeredFilters()
00403     {   QMutexLocker locker(&instance()->mObjectGuard);
00404         return instance()->mFilterRegistry.keys();  }
00405     
00406     inline QStringList Factory::registeredLayouts()
00407     {   QMutexLocker locker(&instance()->mObjectGuard);
00408         return instance()->mLayoutRegistry.keys();  }
00409     
00410     inline void Factory::setObjectProperty(QObject *pObject, 
00411                                            const QString &rProperty, 
00412                                            const QString &rValue)
00413     {   instance()->doSetObjectProperty(pObject, rProperty, rValue); }
00414     
00415     inline void Factory::setObjectProperty(QObject *pObject, 
00416                                            const char *pProperty, 
00417                                            const QString &rValue)
00418     {   instance()->doSetObjectProperty(pObject, QLatin1String(pProperty), rValue);  }

00421     {   instance()->doUnregisterAppender(rAppenderClassName);  }
